src:
'Alex Marquez Jadi Rider Hebat Bukan Karena Kakaknya'
07 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Tim Estrella Galicia 0,0 Marc VDS, Joan Olive, mengaku sangat bangga pada anak buahnya, Alex Marquez, yang sukses mengunci gelar dunia Moto2 2019 di Sepang, Malaysia, akhir pekan lalu. Kepada Marca, Olive meyakini bahwa Marquez memang merupakan rider yang paling layak juara tahun ini.
Marquez telah turun di Moto2 sejak 2015, dan meski selalu menjadi rider papan atas, ia berkali-kali gagal merebut gelar dunia. Tahun ini pun harapannya terwujud, setelah meraih 10 podium dan lima kemenangan, serta konsisten bertarung di depan. Ini adalah gelar dunia keduanya setelah Moto3 2014.
"Sudah jelas Alex adalah juara yang fair tahun ini. Ia telah menunjukkannya sepanjang musim. Ia layak mendapatkannya. Saya sangat bahagia untuknya, karena ia telah memenuhi targetnya meraih gelar dunia, begitu pula dengan tim kami," ujar Olive, yang menggantikan Michael Bartholemy mulai musim ini.
text:
'Alex Marquez Becomes a Great Rider Not Because of His Brother'
Nov 7 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Team Manager Estrella Galicia 0.0 Marc VDS, Joan Olive, claimed to be very proud of his subordinate, Alex Marquez, who successfully locked the Moto2 2019 world title in Sepang, Malaysia, last weekend. To Marca, Olive believes that Marquez is indeed the rider who deserves the most champions this year.
Marquez has been on Moto2 since 2015, and despite always being a top-tier rider, he has repeatedly failed to win the world title. This year his hopes were fulfilled, having won 10 podiums and five wins, and consistently fought ahead. This is his second world title after Moto3 2014.
"It's clear Alex is a fair champion this year. He has shown it all season. He deserves it. I am very happy for him, because he has met his target of winning the world title, as well as our team," said Olive, who replaced Michael Bartholemy from this season.
